SELECT USER_ID, USER_NM, DATE_FORMAT(REGISTER_DATE, '%Y-%m-%d') AS REGISTER_DATE, ROLE, USER_NIC FROM USER WHERE UPPER(USER_ID) = UPPER(#{id})

SELECT NO, TITLE, DATE_FORMAT(APPLY_DATE, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS APPLY_FORMAT_DATE, RECOMMEND, VIEW_CNT, CATEGORY FROM BOARD WHERE UPPER(USER_ID) = UPPER(#{id}) AND DEL_YN IS NULL ORDER BY APPLY_DATE DESC;
